functions.name: register
functions.description: Registers the extension, so the extension can receive input method related events.

parameters.name: callback
parameters.description: This function is called when the event processing is completed.

functions.name: candidateClicked
functions.description: Notifies input method engine that a candidate was clicked.

parameters.name: callback
parameters.description: This function is called when the event processing is completed.

functions.name: cursorUp
functions.description: Notifies input method engine cursor up button was clicked.

parameters.name: callback
parameters.description: This function is called when the event processing is completed.

functions.name: cursorDown
functions.description: Notifies input method engine cursor down button was clicked.

parameters.name: callback
parameters.description: This function is called when the event processing is completed.

functions.name: pageUp
functions.description: Notifies input method engine page up button was clicked.

parameters.name: callback
parameters.description: This function is called when the event processing is completed.

functions.name: pageDown
functions.description: Notifies input method engine page down button was clicked.

parameters.name: callback
parameters.description: This function is called when the event processing is completed.

events.name: onSetCursorLocation
events.description: Fired when input cursor location is changed.

events.name: onUpdateAuxiliaryText
events.description: Fired when auxiliary text is changed.

events.name: onUpdateLookupTable
events.description: Fired when lookup table is updated.
